Translations.Text: Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal, s$uo Mass ik, akked lajel ipwassnen, yili, war ccekk, iuao uaaqeb
Ihi, bibb ayen d qqaoen, sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, uqbel ad inqeo yiiij, uqbel ad i$li, deg iv. Anez di levouf n wass, amar fellak aoavi
Ur ppara allen ik ar wayen i Nefka i kra n twaculin nnsen. D ajeooig n tmeddurt di ddunit, iwakken a ten Njeooeb yis. A$iti n Mass ik yif it, u ad idum kteo
Ameo taeallit i twacult ik, eerz ip. Ur ak Nessutur ooeeq, d Nekwni ara k Ioeeqen. Laaquba d aeezzeb
Nnan: "a lemmer i $ d iusi s ussekni s$uo Mass is"! Day ur ten id iusa ara ubeggen, deg wayen illan di tewoeqtin timezwura
Lemmer iten Nesqucc s uqeiii, uqbel neppa, a d inin, war ccekk: "a Mass nne$! Acimi ur a$ d Tunzev ara amazan? A neddu d issekniyen iK, uqbel a nendell u a neppuqeiii
Ini: "akw, la nepgani. Ihi gganit. A ppissinem anwi i iddan d ubrid ilhan, anwi i ipwanhan
